episodes.title: INTERVIEW: Ben Brown (Kody Brown’s Nephew) Talks Being Raised In A Cult, Advice For The Sister Wives, And His Famous Brown Cousins. Wednesday, October 30th, 2024 | Sarah Fraser
episodes.description: I had an engaging conversation with Ben Brown, a comedian and TikTok star known for his candid takes on his upbringing in a polygamous family, being a nephew of Kody Brown from the Sister Wives franchise. Ben discussed the challenges of growing up poor in a polygamous household governed by strict beliefs, the complexities of family dynamics, and the misconceptions surrounding polygamy. Plus, does he stay in touch with Kody Brown and his cousins. Ben offers Janelle, Meri, and Christine advice now that they’re free, talks TLC and profiting off children, Garrison’s passing, and more. Timestamps: 00:00:00 - Introduction to Ben Brown 00:10:00 - History of Mormonism, Brown family history, when Kody and his dad became polygamists. 00:29:00 - Ben chats mormonism as a cult, Janelle’s mom marrying his grandmother, child abuse and more 00:35::00 - Does he stay in touch with Kody and his cousins, Ben slams TLC, and gives advice for Janelle, Meri, and Christine Live Virtual Podcast Halloween Edition!
